law.catch_line: Discipline of cabinet employee for giving advance notice to facility of impending inspection or investigation.
law.text: Any employee of the cabinet who gives or causes to be given any advance notice to any long-term care facility, directly or indirectly, that an inspection or investigation is under consideration or is impending, unless specifically mandated by federal or state regulations to give advance notice, may be subject to dismissal, suspension or demotion.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1982.
